maps/autumn/path-7-2.json/entities/741/s.orig: Christophorus
maps/autumn/path-7-2.json/entities/741/s.text: Христофорус

maps/autumn/path-7-2.json/entities/741/s.orig: Hi!
maps/autumn/path-7-2.json/entities/741/s.text: Привіт!

maps/autumn/path-7-2.json/entities/741/s.orig: Ah, I see you managed to collect the chest over there.\. Nice work.
maps/autumn/path-7-2.json/entities/741/s.text: Ах, я бачу, тобі вдалося добратися до тієї скрині.\. Хороша робота.

maps/autumn/path-7-2.json/entities/741/s.orig: At least you're not one of those players that just blindly keep jumping into the water here, trying to make that impossible jump.
maps/autumn/path-7-2.json/entities/741/s.text: Принаймні, ти не один із тих гравців, які просто стрибають у воду, намагаючись зробити цей неможливий стрибок.

maps/autumn/path-7-2.json/entities/741/s.orig: I've been at this spot a lot and trust me... I've seen things.
maps/autumn/path-7-2.json/entities/741/s.text: Я пробув у цьому місці довгий час, і повір мені... я бачив і не таке.

maps/autumn/path-7-2.json/entities/741/s.orig: Yes, what is it?
maps/autumn/path-7-2.json/entities/741/s.text: Та що таке?

maps/autumn/path-7-2.json/entities/741/s.orig: Let me guess. You wonder how to reach this chest, don't you?
maps/autumn/path-7-2.json/entities/741/s.text: Дай вгадаю. Тобі цікаво, як дістатися до цієї скрині, чи не так?

maps/autumn/path-7-2.json/entities/741/s.orig: [nods]
maps/autumn/path-7-2.json/entities/741/s.text: [киває]

maps/autumn/path-7-2.json/entities/741/s.orig: Figured...
maps/autumn/path-7-2.json/entities/741/s.text: Гадаю...

maps/autumn/path-7-2.json/entities/741/s.orig: Well, you may have realized this already, but jumping from here on those pillars is not the right solution.
maps/autumn/path-7-2.json/entities/741/s.text: Ну, ти, може, вже зрозуміла, але стрибати звідси на ці стовпи - неправильне рішення.

maps/autumn/path-7-2.json/entities/741/s.orig: No, you'll have to go another way. In fact it's a very round-about path to reach it.
maps/autumn/path-7-2.json/entities/741/s.text: Тобі доведеться піти іншою дорогою. Якщо чесно, то туди можна дістатися тільки досить довгим обхідним шляхом.

maps/autumn/path-7-2.json/entities/741/s.orig: Do you want to know more? I suggest you try to find the way yourself. It's more rewarding.
maps/autumn/path-7-2.json/entities/741/s.text: Ти хочеш знати більше? Я пропоную тобі спробувати знайти шлях самостійно. Це буде корисніше.

maps/autumn/path-7-2.json/entities/741/s.orig: [nods]
maps/autumn/path-7-2.json/entities/741/s.text: [киває]

maps/autumn/path-7-2.json/entities/741/s.orig: Alright then...
maps/autumn/path-7-2.json/entities/741/s.text: Гаразд...

maps/autumn/path-7-2.json/entities/741/s.orig: From here go to the \c[3]west\c[0], close to the exit.
maps/autumn/path-7-2.json/entities/741/s.text: Звідси вирушай на \c[3]захід\c[0], ближче до виходу.

maps/autumn/path-7-2.json/entities/741/s.orig: From there, you can make a jump to a higher platform to the \c[3]south\c[0].
maps/autumn/path-7-2.json/entities/741/s.text: Звідти, ти зможеш здійснити стрибок на високу платформу на \c[3]південі\c[0].

maps/autumn/path-7-2.json/entities/741/s.orig: From there go all the way \c[3]south\c[0] until you reach the previous area.
maps/autumn/path-7-2.json/entities/741/s.text: Звідти пройди весь шлях на \c[3]південь\c[0] до попередньої локації.

maps/autumn/path-7-2.json/entities/741/s.orig: And from there...\. well...\. Actually there is quite a bit more and I can't remember it in detail.
maps/autumn/path-7-2.json/entities/741/s.text: І звідти...\. ну...\. Насправді там ще зовсім небагато, але я не можу згадати подробиці.

maps/autumn/path-7-2.json/entities/741/s.orig: Anyway, I'm sure you'll find the way. Just give it your best shot.
maps/autumn/path-7-2.json/entities/741/s.text: У будь-якому разі, я певен, що ти знайдеш дорогу. Просто покажи все, на що здатна.

maps/autumn/path-7-2.json/entities/741/s.orig: [shakes head]
maps/autumn/path-7-2.json/entities/741/s.text: [махає головою]

maps/autumn/path-7-2.json/entities/741/s.orig: That's the spirit.
maps/autumn/path-7-2.json/entities/741/s.text: Оце рішучість.

maps/autumn/path-7-2.json/entities/741/s.orig: [yes]
maps/autumn/path-7-2.json/entities/741/s.text: [так]

maps/autumn/path-7-2.json/entities/741/s.orig: [no]
maps/autumn/path-7-2.json/entities/741/s.text: [ні]

maps/autumn/path-7-2.json/entities/741/s.orig: So maybe now I can enjoy a quiet moment here.
maps/autumn/path-7-2.json/entities/741/s.text: Ну, можливо, тепер я зможу насолодитися недовгою тишею.

maps/autumn/path-7-2.json/entities/741/s.orig: It's okay. I can't refuse a fellow traveler in need.
maps/autumn/path-7-2.json/entities/741/s.text: Все нормально. Я не можу відмовити мандрівникові в біді.

maps/autumn/path-7-2.json/entities/741/s.orig: [shakes head]
maps/autumn/path-7-2.json/entities/741/s.text: [махає головю]

maps/autumn/path-7-2.json/entities/741/s.orig: So you think you can manage on your own?
maps/autumn/path-7-2.json/entities/741/s.text: То ти думаєш, що зможеш впоратися самостійно?

maps/autumn/path-7-2.json/entities/741/s.orig: Good luck, then.
maps/autumn/path-7-2.json/entities/741/s.text: Ну, тоді, удачі.

maps/autumn/path-7-2.json/entities/741/s.orig: [yes]
maps/autumn/path-7-2.json/entities/741/s.text: [так]

maps/autumn/path-7-2.json/entities/741/s.orig: [no]
maps/autumn/path-7-2.json/entities/741/s.text: [ні]
